name: Realliq
description: REALLIQ is a platform created to ensure the safety and convenience way to invest in crypto assets on DeFi. Platform simplifies the liquidity, staking and provides better farming platform for you and built to manage your funds into long-term assets that are safe and comfortable. We will provide the best experience for you in investing in the block chain world and let your assets do the work for you. Parent of several products in the block chain world that will produce a well performing APY for you. And become one of your right investment choices.
